overview: Adorable Athena Faris cant handle the cravings she has for her stepdad. She cant take it anymore she needs to fuck him. Its time to wake up daddy with her smoking bod. Not so innocent, Danni Rivers, wants stepdaddy, to herself! Proving to him that he wont get better sex from anyone else. Naughty cutie, Emily Willis, seduces step daddy, with her virgin ways! Gorgeous, Paige Owens, catches her stepdad sniffing her panties on her bed. She decides to have some fun with this situation.
title: Daddy's Girl
